item.title: Here are the James Beard Award winners for 2016
item.description:
Here are the James Beard Award winners for 2016

Another year has come and gone for the James Beard Foundation Awards , which just wrapped up at Chicago's Lyric Opera House. The evening proved to be mostly a shut out for Bay Area food makers, though there were a handful of local connections for this year's winners.

item.title: New Adventurous Menu Announced at Jasper's Corner Tap and Kitchen San Francisco
item.description:
New Adventurous Menu Announced at Jasper's Corner Tap and Kitchen San Francisco

May 3, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Following on the heels of the announcement of a new executive chef, Jasper's Corner Tap and Kitchen, now critically hailed as one of the most innovative Union Square restaurants has launched a brand new menu. The menu, which restaurant goers are already noticing, features beloved favorites plus unique additions.

item.title: Wine Experience
item.description:
Wine Experience

"Dig Deep" into Rutherford terroir with Wine Seminars, Tours, and Tastings On Saturday, start the day with in-depth wine seminars at select Rutherford Appellation wineries. Discover more about Rutherford's unique terroir while enjoying vineyard tours, wine tasting, and conversing with winegrowers and winemakers. Two time blocks: 9:30a.m. - 11:00 a.m.

item.title: Miminashi: Oenotri vet Curtis Di Fede's Napa izakaya opens this week
item.description:
Miminashi: Oenotri vet Curtis Di Fede's Napa izakaya opens this week

Better late than never. Former Oenotri chef Curtis Di Fede's new Napa restaurant, Miminashi, which was originally slated to open in February, will finally open its doors this Saturday, May 7. The 85-seat restaurant, located in downtown Napa's historic Young Building, will feature an izakaya-style menu.

item.title: Fourth-Generation Mondavis Are Happily Making Wine Together
item.description:
Fourth-Generation Mondavis Are Happily Making Wine Together

Apply now to be an Enterpreneur360â„¢ company and let us tell the world your success story. Get Started " You hear the name Mondavi, and you think: generational wines, the Napa Valley and maybe even internal family strife. But the fourth generation of Napa Valley's infamous wine family has had enough of the bad blood.

item.title: Dry Creek Vineyard Selected as the Official Wine of the Louis Vuitton America's Cup World Series Events in New York and Chicago
item.description:
Dry Creek Vineyard Selected as the Official Wine of the Louis Vuitton America's Cup World Series Events in New York and Chicago

April 29, 2016 /PRNewswire/ -- Dry Creek Vineyard announced today that it has been selected by the America's Cup Event Authority as the Official Wine of the Louis Vuitton America's Cup World Series events in (May 7 & 8) and (June 11 & 12).

item.title: eBay Celebrates the Launch of Its Wine Category with Exclusive “Wine and Dine” Charity Auctions with 100% of Proceeds Going to Charity
item.description:
eBay Celebrates the Launch of Its Wine Category with Exclusive “Wine and Dine” Charity Auctions with 100% of Proceeds Going to Charity

SAN JOSE, Calif.--()--Last week, eBay introduced eBay Wine ( www.ebay.com/wine) an online destination that allows wine-enthusiasts and experts to browse collectible, rare and everyday wines. In celebration of the launch, eBay for Charity - one of the largest platforms that helps millions of eBay users support the causes they care about - will be auctioning off one-of-a kind "Wine and Dine" experiences.

item.title: BottleRock Napa culinary lineup: Gordon Ramsay, Masaharu Morimoto among the top celebrity chefs
item.description:
BottleRock Napa culinary lineup: Gordon Ramsay, Masaharu Morimoto among the top celebrity chefs

By Jim Harrington, jharrington@bayareanewsgroup.com Posted: 05/02/2016 09:55:43 AM PDT Updated: 05/02/2016 09:55:44 AM PDT Stevie Wonder, the Red Hot Chili Peppers and Florence and the Machine aren't the only ones headed for BottleRock Napa Valley 2016. Along with its deep music offerings, the festival will host an impressive culinary lineup of chefs, vintners and brewers.

item.title: Tourists spend $1.27 billion in Napa County
item.description:
Tourists spend $1.27 billion in Napa County

Napa County visitors spent a record $1.27 billion in the county in 2015, an increase of 8.9 percent over the year before. That's the highest percentage gain among all nine Bay Area counties. The data came from Visit California's annual economic impact report, released on Monday.
